hero.title: Learn <highlight>Python</highlight> through missions, from zero to practical coding
hero.subtitle: Short tasks with tests, XP, and code reviews by an LLM. Learn by doing, with modules and learning paths.

missions.title: Missions in 6-10 minutes
missions.desc: Small steps, quick wins, real progress.

gamification.title: Levels, streaks, badges
gamification.desc: Motivation without pressure, you play and learn at the same time.

llm.title: LLM code review + tests
llm.desc: You get tips: style, readability, complexity, and logic bugs.

preview.desc: Task: write a function `is_even(n)` that returns `True` for even numbers and `False` for odd numbers.

features.title: Why SnakeCoder?
features.subtitle: From zero to practical skills: missions, gamification, and fast feedback for your code.

missions.title: Missions instead of lectures
missions.desc: Short tasks guide you step by step. You learn by writing code.

llm.title: Feedback from AI (LLM)
llm.desc: Comments on solution quality: readability, edge cases, and refactor suggestions.

tests.title: Checked with tests
tests.desc: You immediately know whether your solution passes the test cases.

gamification.title: Gamification that supports you
gamification.desc: XP and levels in the ranking help you stay consistent without pressure.

pcepPcap.title: Paths and modules
pcepPcap.desc: Topics are organized into modules. Start with fundamentals, then move into more advanced areas.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Three simple steps: mission, code, and feedback.

pick.title: Pick a mission
pick.desc: Choose a module. From basics to advanced topics.

solve.title: Write code
solve.desc: Focus on solving. Run tests on the go.

feedback.title: Get reviewed
feedback.desc: Tests + LLM feedback: what works, what to improve, and what to revisit.

paths.title: Learning paths
paths.subtitle: Start from zero, build solid foundations, then pick modules and paths.

pcep.title: Python basics
pcep.desc: Syntax, types, control flow, and basic data structures.

ai.q: Does AI write code for me?
ai.a: No. AI reviews and hints, you solve the mission. It’s about learning, not copying.

pcepPcap.q: How are the learning paths and modules structured?
pcepPcap.a: You learn Python from scratch through short missions. Topics are divided into modules and sprints, from basics to advanced concepts.

time.q: How much time do I need per day?
time.a: Just 10-15 minutes. Missions are short and designed for fast feedback.

level.a: For beginners and intermediates who want practice and rhythm, not long lectures.

cta.title: Jump into a mission and learn by doing
cta.subtitle: Create an account and start with your first mission. Progress stay with you.
cta.secondaryCta: Already have an account? Log in
cta.note: Creating an account is free and takes just a moment.

streak.label: Streak
streak.tooltip: You’re learning consistently, keep the streak going.

dashboard.hint: Next steps and a quick progress overview.
dashboard.title: Hi, {name}!
dashboard.subtitle: Continue your sprint and keep your streak, the rest is one click away.

empty.title: Unlock a module to begin
empty.desc: Go to modules, unlock a learning path, and start your first sprint.

sprint.title: Functions: arguments and returns
sprint.nextTaskDesc: Add type and range checks for arguments and make sure the solution passes the tests.

plan.desc: Three small steps for today, keep the rhythm and progress.
plan.bonusHint: Complete all 3 steps to claim bonus XP.
plan.bonusReady: Congratulations! Today’s bonus XP is yours!

unlock.title: Unlock the sprint test
unlock.desc: Finish the sprint to unlock the test. Tasks left: {tasksLeft}.

skillTest.title: Skill test
skillTest.desc: Passes the sprint and unlocks the next one, meet the requirements first.

nextMission.title: CSV file parser with data validation
nextMission.objective: Load the file, filter records, and prepare the output. Run tests and check the feedback.

quality.title: Code quality
quality.desc: Tests + AI feedback build good habits.

focus.title: Today’s focus
focus.hint: Finish the topic and practice it right away in missions.

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.subtitle: Learning paths
milestones.desc: From 0 through Python basics to Intermediate Python, step by step.

pcep.title: Python basics
pcep.desc: Basics of syntax, types, conditions, and loops.

pcap.title: Intermediate Python
pcap.desc: OOP, modules, exceptions, files, and testing.

recent.title: Recent activity
recent.subtitle: What you did recently
recent.desc: Return to started topics and finish tasks.

items.files: Working with files: reading and writing

generator.title: Generate an extra task
generator.desc: Choose a scope (module/sprint/topic) and practice exactly what you need.

lastRun.subtitle: A quick snapshot from the last day and your solving pace.

modules.title: Choose a module
modules.subtitle: Learn Python in modules: foundations, certifications, and libraries, step by step.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Sprints for exam foundations and a solid base for further learning.

libraries.title: Libraries and frameworks
libraries.subtitle: Learn tools for data and web work, modules coming soon.

register.subtitle: Enter your details and you’ll be back to missions and tests in no time.
